name: Based Floki
description: Welcome to Based Floki, where the crypto adventure begins! Based Floki is more than just a meme-driven cryptocurrency. It’s a community-powered movement, built on a foundation of meme culture, utility, and philanthropy. Based Floki is the ultimate ode to memes in the crypto space. Inspired by Elon Musk’s beloved Shiba Inu pup, our project is all about embracing the fun and frivolity of meme culture. Led by a team of meme enthusiasts, Based Floki is your ticket to a wild ride on the BASE Network. We’re all about spreading laughter, unleashing creativity, and creating unforgettable experiences.
